languages.text: "Возможно, ты прав{mf||а}. Возможно, нас определяет не то, каковы мы, а то, чему мы служим. Благодарю тебя за эту мысль, Домин".
"You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Domin."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, ты прав{mf||а}. Возможно, нас определяет не то, каковы мы, а то, чему мы служим. Благодарю тебя за эту мысль, Домин".

traits.locale_text: "You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this thought, Enim."
"You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this thought, Enim."
"You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Enim."
"You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Enim."
"You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Domin."
"You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Domin."

languages.text: "Vielleicht habt Ihr recht. Vielleicht definiert uns nicht, was wir sind, sondern wem wir dienen. Danke für diese Einsicht, Domin."
languages.original_text: "You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Domin."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht habt Ihr recht. Vielleicht definiert uns nicht, was wir sind, sondern wem wir dienen. Danke für diese Einsicht, Domin."

languages.text: «Puede que tenga razón. Tal vez no nos definamos por lo que somos, sino por aquello a lo que servimos. Gracias por esa revelación, Domin».
languages.original_text: "You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Domin."

traits.locale_text: «Puede que tenga razón. Tal vez no nos definamos por lo que somos, sino por aquello a lo que servimos. Gracias por esa revelación, Domin».

languages.text: 「あなたが正しいかもね。私たちは自分が何者かではなく、奉仕する物で定義されるのかもしれない。その洞察力に感謝するわ、ドミン」
languages.original_text: "You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Domin."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが正しいかもね。私たちは自分が何者かではなく、奉仕する物で定義されるのかもしれない。その洞察力に感謝するわ、エニム」

languages.text: “或许你说得没错，或许我们是谁并不重要，重要的是我们侍奉的是谁。感谢你的真知灼见，秘者。”
languages.original_text: "You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Domin."

traits.locale_text: “或许你说得没错，或许我们是谁并不重要，重要的是我们侍奉的是谁。感谢你的真知灼见，秘者。”

languages.text: « Vous n'avez peut-être pas tort. Peut-être n'est-ce pas notre identité qui nous définit, mais la cause que nous servons. Merci d'avoir partagé avec moi vos lumières, Domin. »
languages.original_text: "You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Domin."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez peut-être pas tort. Peut-être n'est-ce pas notre identité qui nous définit, mais la cause que nous servons. Merci d'avoir partagé avec moi vos lumières, Domin. »

languages.text: "Haklı olabilirsin. Belki de bizi tanımlayan ne olduğumuz değil, neye hizmet ettiğimizdir. Bu bakış açısı için teşekkür ediyorum Domin."
languages.original_text: "You may be right. Perhaps we are defined not by what we are, but by what we serve. Thank you for this insight, Domin."
